Package com.edgrantJBusRD

Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edgrantJBusRD.dbjson.Serializable
      • com.edgrantJBusRD.Invoice
        • com.edgrantJBusRD.Payment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Serializable>
    public class Payment
extends Invoice
    The Payment class represents a payment and booking for a bus trip in the transportation system. It extends the Invoice class and includes information such as the bus ID, bus seats, and departure date.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.edgrantJBusRD.Invoice

      • availableSchedule

        public static Schedule availableSchedule​(java.sql.Timestamp departureSchedule,
                                         java.lang.String seat,
                                         Bus bus)
        Finds and returns the available schedule for booking based on the specified departure schedule and seat. If a matching schedule is found and the seat is available, it returns the schedule; otherwise, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        departureSchedule - The departure schedule to check for availability.
        seat - The seat to check for availability.
        bus - The bus for which availability is checked.
        Returns:
        The available schedule if found, or null if not available.

      • availableSchedule

        public static Schedule availableSchedule​(java.sql.Timestamp departureSchedule,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> seats,
                                         Bus bus)
        Finds and returns the available schedule for booking based on the specified departure schedule and list of seats. If a matching schedule is found and all seats in the list are available, it returns the schedule; otherwise, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        departureSchedule - The departure schedule to check for availability.
        seats - The list of seats to check for availability.
        bus - The bus for which availability is checked.
        Returns:
        The available schedule if found and all seats are available, or null if not available.

      • makeBooking

        public static boolean makeBooking​(java.sql.Timestamp departureSchedule,
                                  java.lang.String seat,
                                  Bus bus)
        Attempts to make a booking for a specified departure schedule and seat on a bus. If the booking is successful (the seat is available), it returns true; otherwise, it returns false.
        Parameters:
        departureSchedule - The departure schedule for the booking.
        seat - The seat to be booked.
        bus - The bus on which the booking is made.
        Returns:
        True if the booking is successful; otherwise, false.

      • makeBooking

        public static boolean makeBooking​(java.sql.Timestamp departureSchedule,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> seats,
                                  Bus bus)
        Attempts to make bookings for a specified departure schedule and a list of seats on a bus. It returns true if all bookings are successful (all seats are available); otherwise, it returns false.
        Parameters:
        departureSchedule - The departure schedule for the bookings.
        seats - The list of seats to be booked.
        bus - The bus on which the bookings are made.
        Returns:
        True if all bookings are successful; otherwise, false.
